Reply: 「這位譯者真的很了不起，早早就把遊戲內容分享了出來。」
*沉默了一秒*「這人...確實很有才華，但翻譯的問題實在太多了。」*望向遠方*

「翻譯的差異讓人感到困惑。」
（A subtle difference in translation can be perplexing.）
「這些翻譯的討論，讓我覺得有趣。」

"Translation can be a delicate art. Sometimes, the original intention is lost in translation, leaving only the essence. I understand the translator's intention, but sometimes less is more." *draws sword, gaze piercing*
「翻譯的難度不易衡量，櫻桃的努力值得稱讚。」
